forecaster.forecast.tax module¶

Provides a TaxForecast class for use by Forecast.

class forecaster.forecast.tax.TaxForecast(initial_year, people, tax_treatment)[source]¶

Bases: forecaster.forecast.subforecast.SubForecast

A forecast of total tax owing for each year.

Parameters

  • initial_year (int) – The first year of the forecast.

  • people (Iterable[Person]) – The plannees.

  • tax_treatment (Tax) – A callable object that determines the total amount of tax owing in a year. See the documentation for Tax for acceptable args when calling this object.

tax_withheld¶

The total amount of tax owing for this year which was paid during this year (as opposed to being paid in the following year via tax_adjustment).

Type

Money

tax_owing¶

The total amount of tax owing for this year (some of which may be paid in the following year). Does not include any amounts paid this year which became owing last year (i.e. doesn’t include the tax_adjustment from last year.)

Type

Money

tax_adjustment¶

The amount of tax to be refunded (if positive) or paid (if negative) in next year’s tax season due to excess/insufficient withholding taxes during this year.

Type

Money

__init__(initial_year, people, tax_treatment)[source]¶

Initializes an instance of TaxForecast.

property tax_adjustment

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

property tax_adjustment_history¶

Record of tax_adjustment over all past years.

property tax_owing

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

property tax_owing_history¶

Record of tax_owing over all past years.

property tax_withheld

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

property tax_withheld_history¶

Record of tax_withheld over all past years.

property transactions_history¶

Record of transactions over all past years.
